forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 19C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun this morning with increasing clouds this afternoon. High 66F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
